Skip Intro Skip Onboarding Do you really want to skip onboarding? Yes No Welcome to ConcertHistory! Here you can access your concert history anytime, in your pocket. The app is a view of your concerts saved on Setlist.fm. Continue ConcertHistory features Display attended concerts Search for artists and concerts Favorite artists and concerts Ready to get started? Enter your Setlist.fm username: Username You can change your username later in the settings. Get started as %1$s Start demo as %1$s You don\'t have a Setlist.fm account yet Account? Register here.
Settings Visited Concerts"> Concerts Details"> Your Favorites">
Theme Dark Theme System Default Light Dark About"> About the App"> Information about Concert History About the development"> Concert History is an application designed to help users maintain a record of their concert attendance. The application utilizes the API provided by setlist.fm, but is not affiliated to setlist.fm About the developer"> Information about us About the development"> Concert History is developed by Niklas Buse and Joshua Slaar. The initially development was as project for a university project. Version Setlist Configuration Username Please enter your Setlist.fm Username
Overview Last Concerts Please enter a username in the settings to see your personal content Favourite Artists Open Settings

However, it may take a few minutes to hours for newly created accounts to be available via their API Create setlist.fm Account
